by-email.title: Didn't receive confirmation instructions?
by-email.succeed: A message with a confirmation link has been sent to your email address. Please follow the link to activate your account.

by-token.title: Confirm my account
by-token.succeed: Your email address has been successfully confirmed. Please sign in to continue.

by-email.title: Didn't receive unlock instructions?
by-email.succeed: You will receive an email with instructions for how to unlock your account in a few minutes.

by-token.title: Unlock my account
by-token.succeed: Your account has been unlocked successfully. Please sign in to continue.

by-email.title: Forgot your password?
by-email.succeed: You will receive an email with instructions on how to reset your password in a few minutes.

reset-password.title: Confirm new password
reset-password.succeed: Your password has been changed successfully.

sign-out.title: Sign out
sign-out.confirm: You will sign out from this system.

errors.inactive: You have signed up successfully. However, we could not sign you in because your account is not yet activated.
errors.locked: You have signed up successfully. However, we could not sign you in because your account is locked.
errors.already-confirmed: Your account was already confirmed, please try signing in.
errors.update-needs-confirmation: You updated your account successfully, but we need to verify your new email address. Please check your email and follow the confirmation link to confirm your new email address.

confirm.body:
Welcome {{recipient}},
You can confirm your account email through the link below:
Confirm my account
confirm.subject: Confirmation instructions

unlock.body:
Hello {{recipient}},
Click the link below to unlock your account:
Unlock my account
Your account has been locked due to an excessive number of unsuccessful sign in attempts.
unlock.subject: Unlock instructions

email-changed.body:
Hello {{recipient}},
We're contacting you to notify you that your email has been changed to {{email}}.
email-changed.subject: Email Changed

change-email.body:
Hello {{recipient}},
We're contacting you to notify you that your email is being changed to {{email}}.
change-email.subject: Email change instructions

password-changed.body:
Hello {{recipient}},
We're contacting you to notify you that your password has been changed.
password-changed.subject: Password changed

reset-password.body:
Hello {{recipient}},
Someone has requested a link to change your password. You can do this through the link below.
Change my password
If you didn't request this, please ignore this email.
Your password won't change until you access the link above and create a new one.
reset-password.subject: Reset password instructions
